Blog.post: Hello my public, for this is Twix's new blog! Real rantings will not start until tomorrow, I'm afraid. Anyways, I am an obsessor with anime. My favorites are Wolf's Rain, Shaman King, Hikaru no Go, Naruto, Inuyasha, and a lot more.

Today I cancelled and uninstalled my beloved Final Fantasy XI that I never got the chance to play. This was because my computer -kicks it- doesn't have a Pentium 4 Processor. It was such a waste of $50. -cries- OMG. urlLink VIRTUAL BUBBLE WRAP .
Certificate of Marriage This is to certify that arctikfox and Hige Were united in Marriage on the 15th day of June 2004 urlLink MYFC Need I say more?

Today...I found a virtual pet site like neo, but better . It's called urlLink Furry Paws and it is a virtual dog site. You can breed, show, do agility/herding/tracking/etc., feed, play and everything. Remind me never to go on neo again >:] But,(this might just be for me though)it is a tad bit slow. My..uh..numberthing is urlLink 51972 for you who want to know. Currently I have two GSD's but I do want to get a corgi^^;. Anyway, today I made brownies. They tasted like cocoa puffs. :] Tomorrow I'm going to make Lemon Bars. Yummy. And you can't have any. Hahahaha. =P Hahahaha! Pickles! xD

Yay! I actually found a nice Wolf's Rain Site! urlLink Clicky! ^^ Anyway, right now it is thunderstorming really bad. Today was basically a waste. I didn't do anything . I am SO lazy. xD Actually, I did get the chance to give urlLink Mih a decent, simple page. Bah. -_-; I also created a new account, urlLink arctikfox . Muahahahahaha >:]

I didn't post it yesterday but SCHOOL IS NOW OUT! I am veryveryvery much glad and very much looking forward to HS. Anyway, today I went to the mall and got a calander to add to my collection. It is a calander with Pembroke Corgis on it! Cute! It will join the wall where I have my two wolf calanders and my Shiba Inu calander. I got a Cinnabon! YUMMY! ^^ Also on neo I finally got my hands on a brown pb. Now I'm setting my sights on a white one. Neo username is wolfsrayne if you want to donate. *puppy eyes*

Ah! Did anybody see Wolf's Rain tonight? I did not get anything x__o. urlLink Someone must explain this to me . Anyway, I'm looking for a bit of a spoiler, so if you know any good anime downloading sites let me know ! I do not feel like waiting every Saturday to watch something for 30 minutes and then wait a whole 'nother week! -_-; But, someone has to agree with meh: HigeisatotallycutieandheremindsmeofSpikefromCowboyBebop. -coughcough- Cattell's 16 Factor Test Results Warmth ||||||||||||||||||||| 62% Intellect ||||||||||||||| 50% Emotional Stability |||||||||||| 38% Aggressiveness |||||||||||| 34% Liveliness ||||||||||||||| 46% Dutifulness ||||||||||||||||||||| 66% Social Assertiveness ||||||||| 30% Sensitivity |||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 90% Paranoia |||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 86% Abstractness |||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 90% Introversion |||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 86% Anxiety |||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 90% Openmindedness |||||||||||||||||||||||| 78% Independence |||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 90% Perfectionism |||||||||||||||||||||||| 74% Tension ||||||||||||||||||||| 62%
